thorwin.math.geo.projection

Class MercatorProjection

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.projection.MercatorProjection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CylindricalProjection, MapProjection

    public final class MercatorProjection
extends java.lang.Object
implements CylindricalProjection
    Mercator projection implementation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static MercatorProjection DEFAULT
